attributes.action: Stop lying,about the cost, benefits,and impact on this crowded Island,of immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As this government has lost control,along time ago,of our borders,and havent,got a clue,whos here,and how many,why do they continue,to quote figures,they know are not accurate.What is the next surprise Bin Laden,working in Gatwick MacDonalds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
